cause.description:
If you're from Alabama, there's no doubt that you love your state.
The only problem? Georgia's better!
How do we solve this problem?
Complete annexation! Join and support the cause of annexing Alabama and renaming it West Georgia today!
1. The novelty of this idea is hillarious.
2. We'd finally have a lottery, so Alabamian residents could save on their gas bill by only having to drive to the local gas station to buy tickets instead of having to travel over to Georgia!
3. And how!
cause.mission: Lead the state of Alabama into a new era.
cause.name: Support Georgia's Annexation of Alabama
